sources.title: Whirlpool (1950) Dir. Otto Preminger, Starring Gene Tierney, Richard Conte, José Ferrer, Charles Bickford, Constance Collier
sources.description: Whirlpool is a 1950 American FILM NOlR directed by Otto Preminger and written by Ben Hecht and Andrew Solt, adapted from Guy Endore's novel Methinks the Lady. The film stars Gene Tierney, Richard Conte, José Ferrer and Charles Bickford, and features Constance Collier in her final film role.    You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia . A detailed article from The Film Board may still be available.

sources.title: Whirlpool (1950)
sources.description: The wife of a psychoanalyst falls prey to a devious quack hypnotist when he discovers she is an habitual shoplifter. Then one of his previous patients now being treated by the real doctor is found murdered, with her still at the scene, and suspicion points only one way. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/whirlpool-1950/

metadata.Plot: The wife of a psychiatrist falls prey to a devious hypnotist when he discovers she's an habitual shoplifter. Then one of his former patients - now being treated by a real psychoanalyst's, found murdered, with her at the scene, suspicion points only one way.
metadata.Writer: Ben Hecht, Andrew Solt, Guy Endore
metadata.Actors: Gene Tierney, Richard Conte, José Ferrer
